title: Brff App
Brff App
description: Um app de Fantasy Football para android com podcast integrado, feito sob demanda para o site BrFFootball. App feito com React Native + TypeScript.
NFL Fantasy app (on demand to https://brffootball.com.br/) with integrated podcast. App build with React Native + TypeScript.

title: Simulador de Draft
Draft Simulator
description: Um simulador de Draft da NFL alimentado por API própria, feito sob demanda para o site On The Clock. Web app feito com React + TypeScript e API feita com Python e Flask.
A NFL Draft Simulator which consumes an API, on demand to On The Clock website. Web app build with React + TypeScript and API build with Python + Flask.

title: CrawJUD - Automação de processos
CrawJUD - Automation for lawyers
description:
Vários bots de automação de serviços jurídicos, que fazem desde peticionamento em massa, busca por processos, movimentações processuais e etc. 
 Feito com Python + Selenium + TkInter sob demanda para clientes como Amazonas Energia S/A.

Several bots to automate services for law offices in Brazil. These bots can do petition protocol, scrapy data, get process updates and etc. 
 Coded with Python + Selenium + TkInter on demand to clients like Amazonas Energia S/A.

title: Interface CrawJUD
Interface CrawJUD
description: Interface para o CrawJUD(coletânea de bots para automação), feita com React + TypeScript + ElectronJS + Node + Firebase.
Interface to CrawJUD(several bots to automate services for law offices), coded with React + TypeScript + ElectronJS + Node + Firebase.

title: Interactive Football Field
Interactive football field
description: Um website completo feito pra ajudar fãs de futebol americano a entender as posições do jogo.
A complete website made to help new football fans to understand how the game really works

title: Gerador de posts para Instagram
Instagram post generator
description: Editor de imagem para facilitar a criação de posts de instagram. Feito com React + TypeScript + Canvas element.
Image editor to create, in a more easy way, posts for instagram. Built using React + TypeScript + Canvas element.
